query: My taxi will pick me up at the campus entrance; take me there.
Where is the main drop-off spot for cars outside the campus?
Bring me to the big gate where people usually meet before events.
I am leaving campus; guide me to the front exit gate.
I want to wait where ride-shares can easily find me at the campus edge.
Take me to the common pickup point just outside the university.
Lead me to the main outdoor meeting point at the border of campus.
Show me the primary vehicle entrance to the campus.
I need a quiet indoor place to review papers I already printed.
Where can I return the book I borrowed last week?
Take me to the place with reference materials I can consult without buying.
I want a silent room with desks and many bookshelves for long study sessions.
I need a book for my class but I want to study it quietly on campus right away.
I don't want to buy anything; I just need somewhere to read academic papers.
Guide me to where there are stacks of reference books and a reading room.
I forgot my textbook and just want to read a copy here without purchasing it.
I’m starving; take me somewhere I can buy a hot meal.
Where can I get a proper lunch, not just snacks from a machine?
Bring me to the canteen where students usually eat together.
I want a place that serves cooked food and drinks at midday.
Take me to the dining hall; I skipped breakfast and need a meal.
Guide me to the restaurant-like space on campus where I can order lunch.
I want to sit at a table indoors and have a full meal, not just rest.
Where can I line up with a tray to get lunch?
I twisted my ankle and need someone to check it.
Take me to the campus place where a nurse or doctor is available.
I feel dizzy and need medical help, not just a place to rest.
Guide me to where they keep first-aid supplies and basic medicine.
I cut my hand slightly; where can I get it cleaned and bandaged?
Bring me to the health clinic for a quick check-up.
I think I have a fever; take me somewhere they can measure my temperature.
My leg hurts badly after a fall; I need help, not a workout.
I want to do strength training on machines.
Take me to the indoor place with treadmills and weights.
Where can I change clothes and work out?
Guide me to the sports facility for a workout session, not for medical care.
I feel restless and want to burn some calories through exercise.
Bring me to the room with exercise equipment and mats.
I want to strengthen my body with training, not see a doctor.
Show me where I can lift dumbbells and use fitness machines.
I need to buy a brand-new textbook, not borrow it.
Take me to the shop that sells course materials.
Where can I purchase notebooks and pens on campus?
Guide me to the place that sells fresh copies of the required reading.
I want to pay for a book to keep, not just read it here.
Bring me to the store for stationery and textbooks.
I lost my workbook; where can I buy another one?
I need to purchase study supplies and a new book for class.
I need to run an experiment with lab equipment, not give a talk.
Take me to the room where we do robotics testing.
Where can I access the laboratory space reserved for research?
Guide me to the experimental lab, not the lecture hall.
I want to use measurement devices and tools for testing.
Bring me to the place where our research group keeps its equipment.
I have to set up an experiment, not attend a lecture; take me there.
Show me the laboratory used for hands-on experiments.
I need the large room where many people sit and listen to a talk.
Take me to the auditorium for my presentation.
Where do public lectures and seminars usually happen?
Guide me to the big hall with rows of seats and a stage.
I am giving a speech to a large audience; bring me to that venue.
Show me the place where conferences and big classes are held.
I want the formal lecture room, not a small lab.
Lead me to the hall where today’s campus-wide talk is scheduled.
I want to sit outside on a bench surrounded by plants.
Take me to a quiet green space to relax, not to eat a full meal.
Where can I breathe fresh air and rest among trees?
Guide me to the outdoor park-like area on campus.
Bring me somewhere outside to clear my head and take a short break.
I don't want to exercise; I just want a calm outdoor place to rest.
Show me the garden area where students can relax between classes.
Lead me to an open, green resting area rather than an indoor room.
I lost my student ID card; where can I report it and get help?
Take me to the place where staff can answer general questions.
Where can I ask for directions when I am confused about buildings?
Guide me to the information desk for campus support.
I have a problem with my schedule; bring me to someone who can assist.
Show me where the lost-and-found service is located.
I need to talk to someone at the support desk, not just meet outside.
Lead me to the counter where I can report an issue on campus.
